17   | /**
18   |  * Common declarations to allow the client to use a custom allocator.
19   |  **/
20   | 
21   | #ifndef __YAJL_COMMON_H__
22   | #define __YAJL_COMMON_H__
23   | 
24   | #include <stddef.h>
25   | 
26   | #ifdef __cplusplus
27   | extern "C" {
28   | #endif
29   | 
30   | #define YAJL_MAX_DEPTH 128
31   | 
32   | /*
33   |  * msft dll export gunk.  To build a DLL on windows, you must define WIN32,
34   |  * YAJL_SHARED, and YAJL_BUILD.  To use a shared DLL, you must define
35   |  * YAJL_SHARED and WIN32
36   |  */
37   | #if (defined(_WIN32) || defined(WIN32)) && defined(YAJL_SHARED)
38   | #  ifdef YAJL_BUILD
39   | #    define YAJL_API __declspec(dllexport)
40   | #  else
41   | #    define YAJL_API __declspec(dllimport)
42   | #  endif
43   | #else
44   | #  if defined(__GNUC__) && (__GNUC__ * 100 + __GNUC_MINOR__) >= 303
45   | #    define YAJL_API __attribute__ ((visibility("default")))
46   | #  else
47   | #    define YAJL_API
48   | #  endif
49   | #endif
50   | 
51   | /*+
52   |  * A pointer to a malloc() function.
53   |  +*/
54   | typedef void *(*yajl_malloc_func)(void *ctx, size_t sz);
55   | 
56   | /*+
57   |  * A pointer to a free() function.
58   |  +*/
59   | typedef void (*yajl_free_func)(void *ctx, void *ptr);
60   | 
61   | /*+
62   |  * A pointer to a realloc() function.
63   |  +*/
64   | typedef void *(*yajl_realloc_func)(void *ctx, void *ptr, size_t sz);
65   | 
66   | /*+
67   |  *  A structure which can be passed to yajl_*_alloc routines to allow the
68   |  *  client to specify memory allocation functions to be used.
69   |  +*/
70   | typedef struct
71   | {
72   |     yajl_malloc_func malloc;	/*+ pointer to a function that can allocate
73   |                                  *  uninitialized memory +*/
74   |     yajl_realloc_func realloc;	/*+ pointer to a function that can resize memory
75   |                                  *  allocations +*/
76   |     yajl_free_func free;		/*+ pointer to a function that can free memory
77   |                                  *  allocated using the (*.realloc)() function
78   |                                  *  or the (*.malloc)() function +*/
79   |     void *ctx;					/*+ a context pointer that will be passed to
80   |                                  *  each of the above allocation routines +*/
81   | } yajl_alloc_funcs;
82   | 
83   | #ifdef __cplusplus
84   | }
85   | #endif
86   | 
87   | #endif
